text: Anton L was a really fascinating
individual when he was young he spent
time in the carnival and circus
worlds he played copy and other things
and even learned some lion taming at a
period in history so he learned how as a
human being he could interact with a big
dangerous animal which is kind of the
way you have to treat most people around
you
also for a period of time he was a
police photographer freelance and he
would take pictures at crime scene so
he'd see like the results of how people
dealt with each other I saw a slice of
life that very few people see on a
regular basis I saw the effects of
Mayhem from spouse to spouse children
splattered by hit run
drivers he grew up in a culture that was
embodied in film Noir where there were
very specific male and female archetypes
where no one was there to help you that
life was a struggle and you might lose
and if you won it might not really be
all that it's cracked up to
be and by playing music in bars for
people where people drink and tell you
their stories you really got a sense of
what the human animal was like
[Music]
